0: We did have a problem with noise from the restaurant refurbishment but this was dealt with superbly by one of the Managers Jack Conroy
It may however benefit from some refurbishment in certain areas to continue to compete with other London hotels in a similar price range
Just after we had reserved our room we received a message notifying us about the renovation of the swimming pool during our stay
Bathroom ok but shower needed updating
I will note that while the exterior of the building is old the interior of the hotel is entirely redone
The bathroom needs serious renovation and according to the staff that is coming soon
Spa changing rooms showers etc could do with a refurb
We were not bothered by the ongoing renovation work happily
Maybe after the renovation the rooms are more worth its price
I will refrain from pointing out the myriad details about the hotel that were wanting in nearly every regard as I expect they will all be addressed during the refurbishment
1: The Rooms are beautifully refurbished quiet cool and the beds very comfortable
Spent a wonderful afternoon at this stunning recently refurbished restaurant
The hotel has been refurbished and I stayed prior to the makeover and again a few days ago
All the staff had been on extensive training whilst the hotel was being refurbished and you could tell
The hotel has had a recent facelift and is looking fantastic
The hotel was recently renovated and the decor is beautifully done
Stayed in London for an event so booked the newly refurbished hotel for 2 nights and was so glad I did
This was a great hotel recently renovated helpful staff lovely eating and bar on site
